name: Tree
description: A tree has broken through a fortress wall and reclaimed part of the keep. This card suggests perseverance in difficult circumstances.

person.upright: A strong-willed person determined to persevere despite hostile conditions.
person.reverse: Someone barely hanging on in hostile conditions.

creatureTrap.upright: A creature that thrives in a hostile environment.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature driven from its preferred environment and struggling to survive in a new region.

place.upright: Somewhere vegetation makes an unexpected appearance: a park in a busy urban center or a tree growing on barren rock.
place.reverse: A place cleared of natural growth.

treasure.upright: A treasure featuring diamonds, pearls, or precious wood, or a magic item that increases endurance (such as an Amulet of Health).
treasure.reverse: An art object or a magic item made from the wood of a tree struck by lightning.

situation.upright: A small outpost or lone individual holding back a much larger force.
situation.reverse: An overwhelming threat against a small outpost or lone individual.
